dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HJ 93 IH: Withdrawing approval of the Agreement Establishing the World Trade Organization.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Tiffany submitted the following joint resolution; which was referred to the Committee on Ways and Means

form.official-title: Withdrawing approval of the Agreement Establishing the World Trade Organization.

section.text: That the Congress withdraws its approval, provided under section 101(a) of the Uruguay Round Agreements Act, of the WTO Agreement as defined in section 2(9) of that Act.
